About ME

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I'm a software engineer, I'm passionate about programming so I don't stop learning everyday, I take every experience seriously to improve my self and get a good feedback from my clients. I have created some project during my university studies, the last one was very interesting (same concept as IKEA's app but for multiple furniture suppliers) And now I'm creating multiple social medias clones & web apps using MERN or React/Firebase
